verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֡ם <S%H120><s%> of man אֱמֹר֩ <S%H559><s%> say לִנְגִ֨יד <S%H5057><s%> unto the prince צֹ֜ר <S%H6865><s%> of Tyrus כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because גָּבַ֤הּ <S%H1361><s%> [is] lifted up לִבְּךָ֙ <S%H3820><s%> Because thine heart וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and thou hast said אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> I [am] a God אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> in מוֹשַׁ֧ב <S%H4186><s%> [in] the seat אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> of God יָשַׁ֖בְתִּי <S%H3427><s%> I sit בְּלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> in the midst יַמִּ֑ים <S%H3220><s%> of the seas וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> yet thou [art] a man וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and not אֵ֔ל <S%H410><s%> and not God וַתִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> though thou set לִבְּךָ֖ <S%H3820><s%> thine heart כְּלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> as the heart אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold חָכָ֛ם <S%H2450><s%> Behold thou [art] wiser אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you [מִדָּנִאֵל כ] (מִדָּֽנִיאֵ֑ל <S%H1840><s%> Daniel ק) כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner סָת֖וּם <S%H5640><s%> there is no secret לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is a עֲמָמֽוּךָ׃ <S%H6004><s%> that they can hide

בְּחָכְמָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H2451><s%> With thy wisdom וּבִתְבוּנָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H8394><s%> and with thine understanding עָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> thou hast gotten לְּךָ֖ חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> thee riches וַתַּ֛עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and hast gotten זָהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver בְּאוֹצְרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H214><s%> into thy treasures

בְּרֹ֧ב <S%H7230><s%> By thy great חָכְמָתְךָ֛ <S%H2451><s%> wisdom בִּרְכֻלָּתְךָ֖ <S%H7404><s%> [and] by thy traffick הִרְבִּ֣יתָ <S%H7235><s%> hast thou increased חֵילֶ֑ךָ <S%H2428><s%> thy riches וַיִּגְבַּ֥הּ <S%H1361><s%> is lifted up לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> and thine heart בְּחֵילֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2428><s%> because of thy riches ס

לָכֵ֕ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַ֛עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because תִּתְּךָ֥ <S%H5414><s%> Because thou hast set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> as the heart כְּלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> thine heart אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> Behold therefore I will bring עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> Against זָרִ֔ים <S%H2114><s%> strangers עָרִיצֵ֖י <S%H6184><s%> upon thee the terrible גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> of the nations וְהֵרִ֤יקוּ <S%H7324><s%> and they shall draw חַרְבוֹתָם֙ <S%H2719><s%> their swords עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Against יְפִ֣י <S%H3308><s%> against the beauty חָכְמָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H2451><s%> of thy wisdom וְחִלְּל֖וּ <S%H2490><s%> and they shall defile יִפְעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3314><s%> thy brightness

לַשַּׁ֖חַת <S%H7845><s%> to the pit יֽוֹרִד֑וּךָ <S%H3381><s%> They shall bring thee down וָמַ֛תָּה <S%H4463><s%> the deaths מְמוֹתֵ֥י <S%H4191><s%> and thou shalt die חָלָ֖ל <S%H2491><s%> of [them that are] slain בְּלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> in the midst יַמִּֽים׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the seas

הֶאָמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Wilt thou yet תֹּאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> say אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> god אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> in לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before הֹֽרְגֶ֑ךָ <S%H2026><s%> him that slayeth וְאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you אָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> man וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and not אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> and no God בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> in the hand מְחַלְלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H2490><s%> of him that slayeth

מוֹתֵ֧י <S%H4194><s%> the deaths עֲרֵלִ֛ים <S%H6189><s%> of the uncircumcised תָּמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> Thou shalt die בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand זָרִ֑ים <S%H2114><s%> of strangers כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD ס
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man שָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> take up קִינָ֖ה <S%H7015><s%> a lamentation עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> upon the king צ֑וֹר <S%H6865><s%> of Tyrus וְאָמַ֣רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> and say לּ֗וֹ כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> You חוֹתֵ֣ם <S%H2856><s%> Thou sealest up תָּכְנִ֔ית <S%H8508><s%> the sum מָלֵ֥א <S%H4392><s%> full חָכְמָ֖ה <S%H2451><s%> of wisdom וּכְלִ֥יל <S%H3632><s%> and perfect יֹֽפִי׃ <S%H3308><s%> in beauty

בְּעֵ֨דֶן <S%H5731><s%> Thou hast been in Eden גַּן־ <S%H1588><s%> the garden אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> of God הָיִ֗יתָ <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every אֶ֨בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone יְקָרָ֤ה <S%H3368><s%> every precious מְסֻכָתֶ֙ךָ֙ <S%H4540><s%> [was] thy covering אֹ֣דֶם <S%H124><s%> the sardius פִּטְדָ֞ה <S%H6357><s%> topaz וְיָהֲלֹ֗ם <S%H3095><s%> and the diamond תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ <S%H8658><s%> the beryl שֹׁ֙הַם֙ <S%H7718><s%> the onyx וְיָ֣שְׁפֵ֔ה <S%H3471><s%> and the jasper סַפִּ֣יר <S%H5601><s%> the sapphire נֹ֔פֶךְ <S%H5306><s%> the emerald וּבָרְקַ֖ת <S%H1304><s%> and the carbuncle וְזָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold מְלֶ֨אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> the workmanship תֻּפֶּ֤יךָ <S%H8596><s%> of thy tabrets וּנְקָבֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5345><s%> and of thy pipes בָּ֔ךְ בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in thee in the day הִבָּרַאֲךָ֖ <S%H1254><s%> that thou wast created כּוֹנָֽנוּ׃ <S%H3559><s%> was prepared

אַ֨תְּ־ <S%H859><s%> you כְּר֔וּב <S%H3742><s%> cherub מִמְשַׁ֖ח <S%H4473><s%> Thou [art] the anointed הַסּוֹכֵ֑ךְ <S%H5526><s%> that covereth וּנְתַתִּ֗יךָ <S%H5414><s%> and I have set בְּהַ֨ר <S%H2022><s%> mountain קֹ֤דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> thee [so] thou wast upon the holy אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God הָיִ֔יתָ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> of the stones אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire הִתְהַלָּֽכְתָּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> thou hast walked up and down

תָּמִ֤ים <S%H8549><s%> Thou [wast] perfect אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> in בִּדְרָכֶ֔יךָ <S%H1870><s%> in thy ways מִיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> from the day הִבָּֽרְאָ֑ךְ <S%H1254><s%> that thou wast created עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until נִמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> was found עַוְלָ֖תָה <S%H5766><s%> till iniquity בָּֽךְ׃

בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> By the multitude רְכֻלָּתְךָ֗ <S%H7404><s%> of thy merchandise מָל֧וּ <S%H4390><s%> they have filled תוֹכְךָ֛ <S%H8432><s%> the midst חָמָ֖ס <S%H2555><s%> of thee with violence וַֽתֶּחֱטָ֑א <S%H2398><s%> and thou hast sinned וָאֶחַלֶּלְךָ֩ <S%H2490><s%> therefore I will cast thee as profane מֵהַ֨ר <S%H2022><s%> out of the mountain אֱלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> of God וָֽאַבֶּדְךָ֙ <S%H6><s%> and I will destroy כְּר֣וּב <S%H3742><s%> cherub הַסֹּכֵ֔ךְ <S%H5526><s%> thee O covering מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> from the midst אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> of the stones אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> of fire

גָּבַ֤הּ <S%H1361><s%> was lifted up לִבְּךָ֙ <S%H3820><s%> Thine heart בְּיָפְיֶ֔ךָ <S%H3308><s%> because of thy beauty שִׁחַ֥תָּ <S%H7843><s%> thou hast corrupted חָכְמָתְךָ֖ <S%H2451><s%> thy wisdom עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by reason of יִפְעָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H3314><s%> thy brightness עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> reason אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee to the ground הִשְׁלַכְתִּ֗יךָ <S%H7993><s%> I will cast לִפְנֵ֧י <S%H6440><s%> thee before מְלָכִ֛ים <S%H4428><s%> kings נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> I will lay לְרַ֥אֲוָה <S%H7200><s%> that they may behold בָֽךְ׃

מֵרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> by the multitude עֲוֹנֶ֗יךָ <S%H5771><s%> of thine iniquities בְּעֶ֙וֶל֙ <S%H5766><s%> by the iniquity רְכֻלָּ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H7404><s%> of thy traffick חִלַּ֖לְתָּ <S%H2490><s%> Thou hast defiled מִקְדָּשֶׁ֑יךָ <S%H4720><s%> thy sanctuaries וָֽאוֹצִא־ <S%H3318><s%> therefore will I bring forth אֵ֤שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire מִתּֽוֹכְךָ֙ <S%H8432><s%> from the midst הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> It אֲכָלַ֔תְךָ <S%H398><s%> of thee it shall devour וָאֶתֶּנְךָ֤ <S%H5414><s%> thee and I will bring לְאֵ֙פֶר֙ <S%H665><s%> thee to ashes עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all רֹאֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H7200><s%> of all them that behold

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יוֹדְעֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H3045><s%> All they that know בָּֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> thee among the people שָׁמְמ֖וּ <S%H8074><s%> shall be astonished עָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and בַּלָּה֣וֹת <S%H1091><s%> at thee thou shalt be a terror הָיִ֔יתָ <S%H1961><s%> have become וְאֵינְךָ֖ <S%H369><s%> and never עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> alway פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man שִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward צִיד֑וֹן <S%H6721><s%> against Zidon וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> and prophesy עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <S%H559><s%> And say כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> behold עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> I am against צִיד֔וֹן <S%H6721><s%> Behold I [am] against thee O Zidon וְנִכְבַּדְתִּ֖י <S%H3513><s%> and I will be glorified בְּתוֹכֵ֑ךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst וְֽיָדְע֞וּ <S%H3045><s%> of thee and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD בַּעֲשׂ֥וֹתִי <S%H6213><s%> when I shall have executed בָ֛הּ שְׁפָטִ֖ים <S%H8201><s%> judgments וְנִקְדַּ֥שְׁתִּי <S%H6942><s%> in her and shall be sanctified בָֽהּ׃

וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <S%H7971><s%> For I will send בָ֞הּ דֶּ֤בֶר <S%H1698><s%> into her pestilence וָדָם֙ <S%H1818><s%> and blood בְּח֣וּצוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H2351><s%> into her streets וְנִפְלַ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> shall be judged חָלָל֙ <S%H2491><s%> and the wounded בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst בְּחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of her by the sword עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> upon מִסָּבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> upon her on every side וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will be no יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become ע֜וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel סִלּ֤וֹן <S%H5544><s%> brier מַמְאִיר֙ <S%H3992><s%> And there shall be no more a pricking וְק֣וֹץ <S%H6975><s%> thorn מַכְאִ֔ב <S%H3510><s%> nor [any] grieving מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> any סְבִ֣יבֹתָ֔ם <S%H5439><s%> of all [that are] round about הַשָּׁאטִ֖ים <S%H7590><s%> them that despised אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְיָ֣דְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> them and they shall know כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> that I [am] the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD ס

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3068><s%> GOD בְּקַבְּצִ֣י ׀ <S%H6908><s%> When I shall have gathered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָֽעַמִּים֙ <S%H5971><s%> from the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom נָפֹ֣צוּ <S%H6327><s%> among whom they are scattered בָ֔ם וְנִקְדַּ֥שְׁתִּי <S%H6942><s%> and shall be sanctified בָ֖ם לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in them in the sight הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen וְיָֽשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> then shall they dwell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in אַדְמָתָ֔ם <S%H127><s%> in their land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> that I have given לְעַבְדִּ֥י <S%H5650><s%> to my servant לְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob

וְיָשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> And they shall dwell עָלֶיהָ֮ <S%H5921><s%> and לָבֶטַח֒ <S%H983><s%> safely וּבָנ֤וּ <S%H1129><s%> therein and shall build בָתִּים֙ <S%H1004><s%> houses וְנָטְע֣וּ <S%H5193><s%> and plant כְרָמִ֔ים <S%H3754><s%> vineyards וְיָשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> yea they shall dwell לָבֶ֑טַח <S%H983><s%> with confidence בַּעֲשׂוֹתִ֣י <S%H6213><s%> when I have executed שְׁפָטִ֗ים <S%H8201><s%> judgments בְּכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> all הַשָּׁאטִ֤ים <S%H7590><s%> upon all those that despise אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> מִסְּבִ֣יבוֹתָ֔ם <S%H5439><s%> them round about וְיָ֣דְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> them and they shall know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> their God ס
